snippet.title: EVERING Chapter I - Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to announce that the first chapter of EVERING, Journey of a Tale, will be releasing on November 24 on itch.io!

Evering is an episodic RPG with an epic story, traditional turn-based combat and a cute pixel art style.

Follow us on Twitter to keep up with all the updates https://twitter.com/PurpureSt_ 


Music: “Thoughts” - Composed by Jonathan Shaw (www.jshaw.co.uk)
